title: So carried myself over the 50% winrate hump on my way to b2 just sliding into those promos and then.
body:
Two teams in a row where the games are 100% winnable but we just up and surrender with a 4 to 1 vote (me being the 1), like what the fuck is wrong with bronze players.

first they play like crap, then i get out of the elo where they permanently play like crap (they are still crap in this mmr but atleast i dont have a permanent headache) and now they are a bunch of defeatist losers who give up too easily?

What the fuck happened to the "the games not over till the nexus is down" mentality.

Like i cant count the number of times ive turned a no nexus tower game through sheer determination.

It honestly feels like these %%%%s dont care about their rank at all, which makes me question, why play ranked in the first place if you arent gonna take it seriously.

replies.body: What you have to realize, which applies to the majority of bronze, is that you are playing with a bunch of people who always want something to blame other than themselves.

Applies to me too, but i at least have the courtesy to actually try and win before i throw in the towel and start looking for reasons why we lost.

Some of us dont queue up for 15 minutes then play for 25 minutes only to lose 18 lp (thank god my mmr isnt trash this pre season, might finally get out of bronze in season 7, then i can start bitching about silver players instead)

Why do you play shaco mid? If you want to climb and improve i suggest you pick up annie and one trick annie till platinum (basically to learn the lane/core skills) 
Also, you could follow this tier list (still relevant below diamond)[](http://i.imgur.com/zqmtyiq.jpg) Pick two of the champions for your roles and stick to them.

because i have an 80% fucking winrate on ap shaco mid.

legit none of what you said applies to me.

And by 80% i mean, 100% assuming no retards.

its literally i dont lose ever, if i lose, 100% chance atleast one fucking person fed, or 2 people are afk, further more, i have 100% winrate in lane phase.

So yeah, thats why i play shaco mid, because its the fucking thing  i can carry these retards with apparently, even though its not even my best fucking champion.

You'll hit a wall eventually where most mid laners will be able to punish you for that pick...

You know I could probably win playing soraka mid, but I won't because even though I can win lane, if I played something viable which I can also play like veigar or zilean or kassadin, I could probably carry harder and it'll work even when I begin to climb into places where I can't play soraka mid without getting wrecked.

You say bronze players are bad when they match your own mmr which is quite contradicting. I know how you feel though, I started season 6 in Bronze 2 after I had a break for like all of S4 and S5 - I'm Gold 5 now but what you have to have is the mentality to win. Every game you get into, you're the best player, no one is better than you are. In champ select, study the enemy team and figure out what you need to do to win, whether it's counter jungle, pressure a side lane or sit on an enemy champion so they don't pop off. But stop blaming your teams for everything, there's a 50% chance of winning every game. If you take bot tower first, that increases your chances of winning from 50% to 70%, if you lose it first, your chance of winning drops from 50% to 30%, catch my drift?

Except right now im playing on flex queue and have a 52% overall winrate and an 80% winrate in the midlane playing ap shaco atm.

my flex queue mmr is higher than my solo queue mmr, which is currently at a 0% winrate after preseason despite having played 10 games since preseason.

Does that not ring alarm bells to you, that i can achieve a positive winrate at a higher mmr but cant win one single game at a lower mmr?

Wanna know why that is?

its because i cant fucking carry retards.

 I can carry semi decent players, or even just slightly bad.

But throw a couple potatos on my team that have a 90% chance of having brain damage.

And its lights out mmr you getting tanked by the potato patrol.

I feel you don't have any issue with confidence. Maybe what you want to do, is play a champion that can more easily solo carry that ap shaco mid (since whilst it's not too hard to go positive with this in bronze, you're not really going to be able to carry or force enemy towers even in the depths of bronze). You're very very confident and I'd argue that if you're in bronze, even if you're much better than bronze, if you feel that the reason you lost is 100% your teammates, you're probably wrong. 

Back when I was learning the game about a year ago now, I think I was around lvl24 at the time and didn't have runes yet, I once saw a very good fizz manage to beat us, when he had a 4man predmade all disconnect at around 10min. In a 1v5, he managed to wreck 5 of us. He got 7 pentakills that game and managed to stall us out to the point where deathtimers were a minute long and eventually he pushed and killed us and we lost, he killed the nexus and he won. Now I know this was against 4 bronze or unranked players and a lvl24, and he was probably high ranked and this was normals but point stand that he did still did it. 

Moral of the story: If you're good enough and the enemy team is bad enough, it won't matter if your teammates are decent or disconnected, you can still win and then have the pride to spam your emote when you kill the enemy nexus.
